entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
